title: How to Manually Adjust the Time and Date on a Sony Auto‚ÄêSet Alarm Clock

steps.title: Press and hold the "Clock" button, until you hear 2 beeps.
steps.content: Press and hold the "Clock" button, until you hear 2 beeps. Release the "Clock" button, when you hear those 2 beeps. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press the Clock button again until the selected portion you'd like to adjust is blinking.
steps.content: Press the Clock button again until the selected portion you'd like to adjust is blinking. It will allow you to adjust the following items in the following order by pressing the Clock button successively: You must first set the year (2 digits only), then month, the day, the hour (AM or PM) and finally the minute portion.

steps.title: Use the plus and minus keys to advance forward and backward the individual entries, depending on how much off the item really is.
steps.content: Use the plus and minus keys to advance forward and backward the individual entries, depending on how much off the item really is. [2] X Research source Adjusting the AM to PM setting can be done, by increasing or decreasing the hour portion of the time, so it extends over the noon or midnight hour.

steps.title: Save your settings.
steps.content: Save your settings. Press the Clock button again, to save your settings.
